plays.text: 2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Landon Wilson
Penalty to Alex Tanguay 2 minutes for High Sticking Claude Lemieux
Goal scored by Daniel Briere unassisted
Penalty to Martin Skoula 2 minutes for Holding Mike Johnson
Penalty to Ladislav Nagy 2 minutes for Roughing Bryan Muir
Penalty to Drake Berehowsky 2 minutes for Crosschecking Dan Hinote
Goal scored by Steve Reinprecht assisted by Alex Tanguay and Joe Sakic
Penalty to Teppo Numminen 2 minutes for Holding Dan Hinote
Goal scored by Chris Drury assisted by Joe Sakic and Martin Skoula
